title: Song and scenery;
author: Moffat, James C.
snippet: But as we have no design upon the Bishop's wine, nor desire to imitate "The Witch of Fyfe" and her " Auld Gudeman," nor to see how "The sun shines fair on Carlisle wall," we shall turn from Canobie westward into Kirkpatrick-Fleming, the old parish of Kirkconnel, and pass through to the beautifully wooded banks of Kirtle.
